item.title: Sky TV Remote Codes
item.description: Sky provide a remote code tool on their website, but it can hardly be called accurate. It’s happened on a few occasions now, that I spend some time trying different codes that the tool provides for a TV, only to be left empty-handed (well, not entirely… I actually end up with my hands full… one remote in each hand in fact.) So I’ve decided to create a post on here, which undoubtedly Google will spider at some point, that I’ll keep updated with every future encounter that Sky’s website doesn’t help with.
